prompt: Pixel art icon of a raw resource called {Copper Ore} for a 2D idle sci-fi fantasy game. The resource is unrefined and natural, made of {Copper Ore}. Organic shape with rough edges or fluid form. Dominant colors must be chosen ONLY from the locked 32-color palette listed below. No glow or only minimal natural shimmer. Clean silhouette, readable at small sizes. Front-facing view. White background. Flat colors only, no gradients.
color_palette_rule: Use ONLY the fixed 32-color global palette. No new colors allowed.
negative_prompt: refined, polished, futuristic machinery, gradients, smooth shading, photorealistic, 3D render, blur, text, watermark, border, colors outside palette
